籤詩版本二:
E hiki mai ana ka punawai, e mohala mai ana na pua ma ka lanai, a e lawe mai ana na kaa e holo ana he mau tausani mile ka mamao.
Inā loaʻa iā ʻoe ka nalu pae ʻekolu o Yumen, e like ia me ka hekili ma ka honua
詩意:
Hōʻike kēia hexagram i ke kiʻi o ka hālāwai ʻana me ka mōʻī ma ke aloaliʻi.
He maikaʻi loa nā mea a pau.
解曰:
Ua hoonohoia ka Emepera. E like me ka waiwai i loaʻa i ka ʻilihune. E hahai i kou puʻuwai. ʻO ka mua ma waena o nā hexagrams.
Ke hahai nei kēia hōʻailona i ka makemake o kou puʻuwai. Ua maikaʻi nā mea a pau.
籤詩故事一:
◇ ʻEkolu yuan ma ka ʻoihana
ʻO Shang Ren (1414-1486), ka inoa aloha ʻo Hongzai, ka inoa kapakapa ʻo Suting, ka inoa posthumous ʻo Wenyi, he kamaʻāina ʻo ia no Chunʻan, Zhejiang, Kina. Ua hānau ʻia ʻo ia ma ka lā 25 o Pepeluali, ka makahiki ʻumikūmālua o Yongle i ka Ming Dynasty.
ʻAʻole ʻo kona makuakāne a ʻaʻole hoʻi kona mau kūpuna he mau luna, akā ua aloha ʻia ʻo ia e ka mea akamai ʻo Wang Rui i kona mau makahiki ʻōpio. I ka makahiki 10 o Xuande i ka Ming Dynasty (1435), ʻo ia ke kūlana mua ma ka hoʻokolokolo kūloko (Xie Yuan). , ua hāʻule ʻo ia ma nā hoʻokolohua he nui, no laila ua hoʻolaʻa ʻo ia iā ia iho i ke aʻo ʻana ma Taixue, a ua aloha nui ʻia e ka Imperial Academy. a laila hoʻonoho mua ʻia ma ka Hale Hōʻikeʻike (Zhuangyuan). I ka Ming Dynasty, ʻo Huang Guan wale nō a me ia, ka poʻe i hoʻokuʻu ʻia e Zhu Di, i loaʻa kēia hanohano.
聖意: Laki maikai ma ka home, laki maikai, laki ma ka oihana, laki ma ka mare, pomaikai ma Liujia, nuhou maikai no ka poe huakai, nuhou maikai ma na mahinaai, enuhe silika, laki maikai i na holoholona, ​​pomaikai i ka loaa ana o kanaka, hoihoi, hookolokolo, lanakila. , migration, laki maikai i na mea nalowale, mai, Anshan a me na lua kupapau
